getYieldById(uint256).details: reverts if id is out of bounds

lastYield().details: If there is only 1 yield reported, the current yield is returned

reportYield(int256).details: reverts if called by a non-policy addressemits a ReportYield event

returns._0: uint256  index of the reported yield

decimals().notice: return the number of decimals expect in the fixed point yield representation (9)

lastYield().notice: returns the previous yield value or 0 if no previous yield
